welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tulsa! Get ready to experience the charm and hospitality of this vibrant city, known for its rich history, thriving arts scene, and beautiful outdoor spaces. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tulsa has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Cracker Barrel
restaurants.description: Cracker Barrel is a american restaurant located in Tulsa.

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Tulsa.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tulsa International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Tulsa International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Tulsa International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
